Experiment Method.Assay Method: Dopamine level measurement in olfactory bulb (OB)

Material used.Material Name: Transgenic mouse model with human mutant A30P alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Evaluation of dopamine levels in the olfactory bulb and behavioral tests in transgenic mice.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Altered dopamine levels and behavioral deficits
Readout description.Result Description: Reduced dopamine levels in the olfactory bulb and impaired behavioral outcomes in transgenic mice compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard dopamine levels in the olfactory bulb of wild-type mice.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significantly reduced dopamine levels or impaired behavioral outcomes compared to wild-type controls.
